skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Echo, an E-class destroyer of the Royal Navy. I was in the Battle of the Denmark Strait along with Hood and Wales, after which I brought Wales safely back to port~ Ehehe, it's a memory I cherish! Oh, also, Edinburgh is really precious to me!
skins.acquisition: Hello, Commander~! Echo, reporting in! So, after I finish checking in, can I have a reward? Ehehe~? I loooove candy, you see~
skins.login: Ah, Commander~? Ehehe, you're back! You know, Echo was reaaaally lonely~ Hurry up and come play with me~
skins.details: Wales, someone can be small and still have a lot of potential, you know! Ehehe, Echo doesn't know what that means, but maybe they're words of praise~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I made a promise to Edinburgh: I must return to port now and then, no matter how far away I go~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Be it with my E-class sisters or strangers, I can make friends with anyone I have fun with, so don't worry about me!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Echo is by your side, Commander! And if you give Echo a high-five, you might feel more motivated!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, carry me like a princess! Echo's quite lightweight! ... Ahahaha~ Commander, that tickles~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wha...? Hood said I shouldn't let people touch me there...
